name: Stick Fight The Combat
description:
Stick Fight the combat is a physics-based couch fighting game where you battle it out as the iconic stick figures.
Fight it out against your friends or find random sticks from around the world!

Physics-Based Combat System

- 100 Highly Interactive Level character
- Skill tree
- 8 Bosses
- Market Black
- Lots of weapons!
- Daily Rewards ...
